key.name: enable-direct-window-switch
key.summary: Enables Super-TAB and Super-Shift-TAB bindings for quick window switching

key.name: enable-mouse-follows-focus
key.summary: Enables automatic teleporting of cursor to newly focused windows

key.name: enable-dbus-window-focus
key.summary: Enables a D-Bus interface to predictably focus windows

key.name: switch-window-next-workspace
key.summary: Switch to the next window on the current workspace

key.name: switch-window-prev-workspace
key.summary: Switch to the previous window on the current workspace
